attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel it is an absurd idea to ask BRITISH CITIZENS to go in front of a panel to be interviewed for a passport that they are entitled to by right, for such as the elderly or infirm ones to ask them to travel miles to do this is absurd and for most of them impractical. While i can appreciate the need to be vigilant in todays society, surely a system whereby a BRITISH CITIZEN that has had a passport for years should be exempt from this legislation. I hope others agree with me

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/IDcardcosts/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
